publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-232 Joe FitzPatrick: Baldragon Academy’s Success—That the Parliament congratulates Baldragon Academy of Dundee on earning the chance to host BBC Radio Scotland’s SoundTown project and notes that pupils will acquire technical and presentational skills while operating a radio studio for the next 12 months, contributing directly to a number of BBC Radio Scotland broadcasts.
S3M-232 Baldragon Academy’s Success (lodged on 22 June 2007) Marlyn Glen*
